CustomField.formula: IF( npsp__Deceased__c = False, of_Donations_during_Last_Year__c + Prospect_Confirmed_Securities_Score__c + Prospect_Donor_Year_Score__c + Prospect_iWave_Score__c + Prospect_Private_Company_Ownership_Score__c + Prospect_Screened_Capacity_Score__c + Prospect_Target_Analytics_Wealth_Score__c + Previous_Annual_Gift_NOZA__c + Previous_Environmental_Gift_NOZA__c ,0)
CustomField.label: Cumulative Prospect Research Score
